title: Part Two: Edward Bernays: The Founding Father of Lies
itunes:title: Part Two: Edward Bernays: The Founding Father of Lies
description:
In part two, Robert is joined again by Jamie Loftus to continue discussing Edward Bernays, a pioneer in public relations, propaganda and lying.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
